attributes.action: make all internet site owners be crb checked before they can set one up
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To make sure that all owners of internet sites are crb checked before they can set up a site and if they have a site already to have one done also.If charity organisations and workplaces have them then these places should have them also to protect the community.After having children knock on my door for things that have been advertised on these free sites then these sites need more in the way of enhanced government protections with age restrictions of who can join them as well.
Having teenagers I am sure most people feel that the computer is not a safe place and however moderated it is by parents feel that more should be done.
